title: Video Editor for Dropshipping Ads – Creative & Research-Savvy
job_overview:
Our e-commerce company is hiring! We’re looking for a full-time Video Editor who specializes in creating high-converting ad creatives for dropshipping products. This role is perfect for someone who understands the world of e-commerce, knows how to edit videos that convert to sales, and can research and source creatives from competitor ads (e.g., through Facebook Ad Library or similar tools).

Key Responsibilities:
- Create scroll-stopping video ads for Upgrade to see actual info products for Facebook.
- Research and analyze competitor ads using tools like Facebook Ad Library, PPSpy, Minea, or manual deep dives to find effective video angles and winning formats.
- Repurpose raw materials (product pages, supplier videos, images) into high-converting creatives.
- Add voiceovers, subtitles, callouts, and other attention-grabbing elements.
- Ensure creatives match the product positioning and communicate benefits clearly and visually.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing for e-commerce/dropshipping.
- Ability to find and reverse-engineer winning ads from competitors.
- Proficiency with video editing tools (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, etc.).
- Experience with subtitles, voiceovers, hooks, and fast-paced ad formats.
- Basic knowledge of what makes an ad convert (angles, CTAs, problem-solution framing).
- High attention to detail – please include ???facebook ad library” as your answer to the first application question.
- Must be accountable, fast, and reliable.

Compensation & Growth Path:
Trial period (1 month): $6–$10/hour (based on experience).
After a successful trial: fixed fee per creative + significant bonus potential based on ad performance.
Long-term opportunity to grow with a performance-driven team in a high-potential niche.

Why Work With Us?
- 100% remote, flexible hours
- Paid bi-weekly (13x/year)
- Work directly with the founder

Join a fast-growing dropshipping brand with serious ad spend!
Big room for growth, bonuses, and creative freedom

If you're passionate about e-commerce, skilled in creative video editing, and love diving into competitive research—apply now and show us what you can do!

Kind regards,
Jeremy Vos
